title: Strictly viewers slam Adam Lambert after spotting major change with dancers
text:

Strictly Come Dancing viewers were furious tonight after watching US singer Adam Lambert perform.

They noticed he brought his own dancers to the results show - with the BBC deciding not to use their professionals for the performance.

This upset fans who looked forward to watching their favourite regulars dance alongside the performers each week.

Taking to Twitter , one questioned: "No SCD dancers allowed on with Adam Lambert?"

"I hate when they have their own dancers and we don’t get the pros!

(Image: BBC/Guy Levy)

(Image: BBC/Guy Levy)

"The singers literally come on so the pros get another chance to entertain us. We don’t actually care about who’s singing", claimed another.

"No strictly dancers? Disappointed with the otherwise lovely adamlambert", added a third.

A fourth wrote: "I wish performers would not bring their own dancers...i look forward to the professionals performing on the result show.

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

"Great performance though..."

Adam, 37, did put on a great show which went down well with the viewers, dancers aside.

One raved: "Adam Lambert, one of the most incredibly underrated singers in the world".

(Image: BBC/Guy Levy)

(Image: BBC/Guy Levy)

"Oh good grief @adamlambert absolutely kicked the a**e out of that performance", exclaimed another.

"The best singer to perform on #Strictly this year. A shame he had his own dancers", commented a third.

A representative for Adam Lambert confirmed that the choice of dancers was a decision made by the BBC and not by the artists themselves.

Meanwhile, it was announced that pairs Catherine Tydesley and Johannes Radebe, and Mike Bushell and Katya Jones would be going head to head in the dance off.

Catherine and Johannes were eliminated after a vote from the judges.
description: Adam Lambert brought his own dancers for his Strictly Come Dancing results show performance
